actionPack.name: Liquibase
actionPack.description: Integration actions for Liquibase, the database versioning tool.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

SCRIPTAction.name: Liquibase - UnInstall - Windows
SCRIPTAction.description: Uninstall Liquibase from the installation directory on a Windows system.

inputParamList.name: Install Directory
inputParamList.description: Directory for the installation of Liquibase once downloaded.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.

powerShellScript.content:
###########################################################
# AUTHOR  : Andrii Dziuba
# DATE    : 2014-02-14
# NAME    : UnInstall Liquibase
###########################################################
 
#ERROR REPORTING ALL
Set-StrictMode -Version latest
 
#---------------------------------------------------------- 
#STATIC VARIABLES
#----------------------------------------------------------
$pathToLiquibaseJar = "${Install Directory}\liquibase.jar"

Function DeleteJar
{
	If (Test-Path $pathToLiquibaseJar){
		Remove-Item $pathToLiquibaseJar
		Write-Host "File: $pathToLiquibaseJar is deleted"
		return
	}
	Else {
		Write-Host "ERROR# File: $pathToLiquibaseJar not found"
	}
	
}
 
Function RunAll
{
	DeleteJar
}

#RUN SCRIPT
RunAll
"Done, Thank You"
